00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "PMeanPMetric.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00043 
00044 bool PMeanPMetric::average( PatchData& pd,
00045                             QualityMetric* metric,
00046                             const std::vector<size_t>& qm_handles,
00047                             double& value, 
00048                             MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050   bool rval = true;
00051   value = 0;
00052   for (std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i= qm_handles.begin();
00053        i != qm_handles.end(); ++i) {
00054     double mval;
00055     if (!metric->evaluate( pd, *i, mval, err )) 
00056       rval = false;
00057     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00058     value += P.raise(mval);
00059   }
00060   value /= qm_handles.size();
00061   return rval;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 bool PMeanPMetric::average_with_indices( PatchData& pd, 
00066                                          QualityMetric* metric,
00067                                          const std::vector<size_t>& qm_handles,
00068                                          double& value, 
00069                                          std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00070                                          MsqError& err )
00071 {
00072   indices.clear();
00073   
00074   bool rval = true;
00075   value = 0;
00076   for (std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i = qm_handles.begin();
00077        i != qm_handles.end(); ++i) {
00078     double mval;
00079     mIndices.clear();
00080     if (!metric->evaluate_with_indices( pd, *i, mval, mIndices, err )) 
00081       rval = false;
00082     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00083     value += P.raise(mval);
00084     
00085     std::copy( mIndices.begin(), mIndices.end(), std::back_inserter(indices) );
00086   }
00087   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00088   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00089   
00090   value /= qm_handles.size();
00091   return rval;
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool PMeanPMetric::average_with_gradient( PatchData& pd, 
00095                                           QualityMetric* metric,
00096                                           const std::vector<size_t>& qm_handles,
00097                                           double& value, 
00098                                           std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00099                                           std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00100                                           MsqError& err )
00101 {
00102   indices.clear();
00103   gradient.clear();
00104 
00105   std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator  g;
00106   std::vector<size_t>::iterator j, k;
00107   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00108   
00109   bool rval = true;
00110   value = 0;
00111   for (i = qm_handles.begin(); i != qm_handles.end(); ++i) {
00112     
00113     double mval;
00114     mIndices.clear();
00115     mGrad.clear();
00116     if (!metric->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, *i, mval, mIndices, mGrad, err )) 
00117       rval = false;
00118     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00119     value += P.raise(mval);
00120     
00121     double p1val = P.value() * P1.raise( mval );
00122     for (j = mIndices.begin(), g = mGrad.begin(); j != mIndices.end(); ++j, ++g) {
00123       
00124       *g *= p1val;
00125       k = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), *j );
00126       if (k == indices.end() || *k != *j) {
00127         k = indices.insert( k, *j );
00128         size_t idx = k - indices.begin();
00129         gradient.insert( gradient.begin() + idx, *g );
00130       }
00131       else {
00132         size_t idx = k - indices.begin();
00133         gradient[idx] += *g;
00134       }
00135     }
00136   }
00137   
00138   double inv_n = 1.0 / qm_handles.size();
00139   value *= inv_n;
00140   for (g = gradient.begin(); g != gradient.end(); ++g)
00141     *g *= inv_n;
00142   
00143   return rval;
00144 }

00147 bool PMeanPMetric::average_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00148                                         QualityMetric* metric,
00149                                         const std::vector<size_t>& qm_handles,
00150                                         double& value,
00151                                         std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00152                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00153                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diagonal,
00154                                         MsqError& err )
00155 {
00156     // clear temporary storage
00157   mIndices.clear();
00158   mGrad.clear();
00159   mDiag.clear();
00160   mOffsets.clear();
00161   mValues.clear();
00162   
00163     // Evaluate metric for all sample points,
00164     // accumulating indices, gradients, and Hessians
00165   bool rval = true;
00166   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator q;
00167   for (q = qm_handles.begin(); q != qm_handles.end(); ++q) {
00168     double mval;
00169     indices.clear();
00170     gradient.clear();
00171     diagonal.clear();
00172     if (!metric->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, *q, mval, indices, gradient, diagonal, err )) 
00173       rval = false;
00174     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00175     
00176     mValues.push_back( mval );
00177     mOffsets.push_back( mIndices.size() );
00178     std::copy( indices.begin(), indices.end(), std::back_inserter(mIndices) );
00179     std::copy(gradient.begin(),gradient.end(), std::back_inserter(mGrad) );
00180     std::copy(diagonal.begin(),diagonal.end(), std::back_inserter(mDiag) );
00181   }
00182   mOffsets.push_back( mIndices.size() );
00183   
00184     // Combine lists of free vertex indices, and update indices
00185     // in per-evaluation lists to point into the combined gradient
00186     // and Hessian lists.
00187   indices = mIndices;
00188   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00189   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00190   std::vector<size_t>::iterator i, j;
00191   for (i = mIndices.begin(); i != mIndices.end(); ++i) {
00192     j = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), *i );
00193     assert( *j == *i );
00194     *i = j - indices.begin();
00195   }
00196   
00197     // Allocate space and zero output gradient and Hessian lists
00198   const size_t n = indices.size();
00199   const size_t m = mValues.size();
00200   const double inv_n = 1.0 / m;
00201   double v;
00202   gradient.clear();
00203   gradient.resize( n, Vector3D(0,0,0) );
00204   diagonal.clear();
00205   diagonal.resize( n, SymMatrix3D(0.0) );
00206   
00207     // Average values, gradients, Hessians
00208   value = 0.0;
00209   for (size_t k = 0; k < m; ++k) { // for each metric evaluate
00210     if (P.value() == 1.0) {
00211       v = P.raise( mValues[k] );
00212         // for each gradient (or Hessian) for the local metric evaluation
00213       for (size_t r = mOffsets[k]; r < mOffsets[k+1]; ++r) {
00214         const size_t nr = mIndices[r];
00215 
00216         mDiag[r] *= inv_n;
00217         diagonal[nr] += mDiag[r];
00218         mGrad[r] *= inv_n;
00219         gradient[nr] += mGrad[r];
00220       }
00221     }
00222     else {
00223       const double r2 = P2.raise(mValues[k]);
00224       const double r1 = r2 * mValues[k];
00225       v = r1 * mValues[k];
00226       const double h = r2 * P.value() * (P.value() - 1) * inv_n;
00227       const double g = r1 * P.value() * inv_n; 
00228         // for each gradient (or Hessian) for the local metric evaluation
00229       for (size_t r = mOffsets[k]; r < mOffsets[k+1]; ++r) {
00230         const size_t nr = mIndices[r];
00231 
00232         mDiag[r] *= g;
00233         diagonal[nr] += mDiag[r];
00234         diagonal[nr] += h * outer( mGrad[r] );
00235         mGrad[r] *= g;
00236         gradient[nr] += mGrad[r];
00237       }
00238     }
00239     value += v;
00240   }
00241   
00242   value *= inv_n;
00243   
00244   return rval;
00245 }
00246 
00247 bool PMeanPMetric::average_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd, 
00248                                          QualityMetric* metric,
00249                                          const std::vector<size_t>& qm_handles,
00250                                          double& value, 
00251                                          std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00252                                          std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00253                                          std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00254                                          MsqError& err )
00255 {
00256     // clear temporary storage
00257   mIndices.clear();
00258   mGrad.clear();
00259   mHess.clear();
00260   mOffsets.clear();
00261   mValues.clear();
00262   
00263     // Evaluate metric for all sample points,
00264     // accumulating indices, gradients, and Hessians
00265   bool rval = true;
00266   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator q;
00267   for (q = qm_handles.begin(); q != qm_handles.end(); ++q) {
00268     double mval;
00269     indices.clear();
00270     gradient.clear();
00271     Hessian.clear();
00272     if (!metric->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, *q, mval, indices, gradient, Hessian, err )) 
00273       rval = false;
00274     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00275     
00276     mValues.push_back( mval );
00277     mOffsets.push_back( mIndices.size() );
00278     std::copy( indices.begin(), indices.end(), std::back_inserter(mIndices) );
00279     std::copy(gradient.begin(),gradient.end(), std::back_inserter(mGrad) );
00280     std::copy( Hessian.begin(), Hessian.end(), std::back_inserter(mHess) );
00281   }
00282   mOffsets.push_back( mIndices.size() );
00283   
00284     // Combine lists of free vertex indices, and update indices
00285     // in per-evaluation lists to point into the combined gradient
00286     // and Hessian lists.
00287   indices = mIndices;
00288   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00289   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00290   std::vector<size_t>::iterator i, j;
00291   for (i = mIndices.begin(); i != mIndices.end(); ++i) {
00292     j = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), *i );
00293     assert( *j == *i );
00294     *i = j - indices.begin();
00295   }
00296   
00297     // Allocate space and zero output gradient and Hessian lists
00298   const size_t N = indices.size();
00299   const size_t m = mValues.size();
00300   const double inv_n = 1.0 / m;
00301   double v;
00302   gradient.clear();
00303   gradient.resize( N, Vector3D(0,0,0) );
00304   Hessian.clear();
00305   Hessian.resize( N*(N+1)/2, Matrix3D(0.0) );
00306   
00307     // Average values, gradients, Hessians
00308   Matrix3D outer;
00309   value = 0.0;
00310   std::vector<Matrix3D>::iterator met_hess_iter = mHess.begin();
00311   for (size_t k = 0; k < m; ++k) { // for each metric evaluate
00312     if (P.value() == 1.0) {
00313       v = P.raise( mValues[k] );
00314         // for each gradient (or Hessian row) for the local metric evaluation
00315       for (size_t r = mOffsets[k]; r < mOffsets[k+1]; ++r) {
00316         const size_t nr = mIndices[r];
00317           // for each column of the local metric Hessian
00318         for (size_t c = r; c < mOffsets[k+1]; ++c) {
00319           const size_t nc = mIndices[c];
00320           *met_hess_iter *= inv_n;
00321           if (nr <= nc)
00322             Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += *met_hess_iter;
00323           else
00324             Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal( *met_hess_iter );
00325           ++met_hess_iter;
00326         }
00327         mGrad[r] *= inv_n;
00328         gradient[nr] += mGrad[r];
00329       }
00330     }
00331     else {
00332       const double r2 = P2.raise(mValues[k]);
00333       const double r1 = r2 * mValues[k];
00334       v = r1 * mValues[k];
00335       const double h = r2 * P.value() * (P.value() - 1) * inv_n;
00336       const double g = r1 * P.value() * inv_n; 
00337         // for each gradient (or Hessian row) for the local metric evaluation
00338       for (size_t r = mOffsets[k]; r < mOffsets[k+1]; ++r) {
00339         const size_t nr = mIndices[r];
00340           // for each column of the local metric Hessian
00341         for (size_t c = r; c < mOffsets[k+1]; ++c) {
00342           const size_t nc = mIndices[c];
00343           *met_hess_iter *= g;
00344           outer.outer_product( mGrad[r], mGrad[c] );
00345           outer *= h;
00346           outer += *met_hess_iter;
00347           if (nr <= nc)
00348             Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += outer;
00349           else
00350             Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal( outer );
00351           ++met_hess_iter;
00352         }
00353         mGrad[r] *= g;
00354         gradient[nr] += mGrad[r];
00355       }
00356     }
00357     value += v;
00358   }
00359   
00360   value *= inv_n;
00361   
00362   return rval;
00363 }
